Articles.Content:
Um, wheres the bug reporting area? Cant find it.

THe bug, if you are wondering, is the fact that when you are not looking at extended solar panels on a rocket on the ground- e.g the grass on kerbin- it falls off. I am seriy=us. It has happened 2 times- both when i deployed buggies to the moon. I stopped them with extended solar panels, went to check on a satellite on a kerbin escape, and when i returned the solar panes were not there. It seems to only happen with gigantor XL solar panels and sp photovotic cells- both a and b.

Edited September 27, 2014 by Claw
tags

Hi Affinity,

Bug fixes go in the support section. If you don't mind, could you supply a picture of your ships or maybe a save file so we can check it out?

You can refer to this thread, it will tell you what kind of information to include and where it's located.

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw

Edited September 27, 2014 by vexx32
you forgot your link
